issue.title: Added select fields in MD edition: placeholder not translated
issue.body:
**Original author :** Blatti Yves

When we add a field (or a class containing fields) in metadata edit forms,
if the field is a 'select' the placeholder is "select an option" whatever the user language is.

**Fixed versions :** 4.3.2
